price: Na wataambiwa: Wako wapi mlio kuwa mkiwaabudu
arabic: وَقِيلَ لَهُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡبُدُونَ
footnotes: Wakaambiwa kwa kuwatahayarisha: Iko wapi hiyo miungu yenu mliyo kuwa mkiiabudu badala ya Mwenyezi Mungu?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waqīla lahum ayna mā kuntum taʿbudūna
